mc_user_reviews.text: An Average Movie, Could have been way better... The dialogue is too cheesy. Too many mistakes in comparison between what happened and the script (like for instance, Biggie doing his freestyle in the year 1990, and with a zoom out you get to see him standing next to a poster of 2Pac's movie "Juice" which was released in 1992)
Bad in every way. Bad acting. Bad directing. Bad pacing. Bad dialog. Bad. Bad. Bad.

There is some room for improvement in this movie but that didn't keep me from truly enjoying it. I watched this not knowing a thing about the Notorious B.I.G and I did not feel lost at any part in the movie. It is also a movie about music that actually contains a good amount of music from that artist. I'm thinking about checking out biggie after watching this movie.
Notorious is famous and infamous at the same time. That's why we should fuse those two words together to form one word even though they'll result in the same title.

Good casting and soundtrack, but Notorious feels too depressing to be an enjoyable movie after a while. The movie tells the story well, but leans on drama that is almost never fun or cheerful, although the ending was very emotional.
